title: Police looking for Lexington shooting suspects
content:
LEXINGTON, Ky. (WKYT) - Lexington police are looking for two people wanted for shooting a teenager Thursday evening.
Police say just before 7 p.m., a 16-year-old was shot in the arm and the leg on Danielle Lane.
He was taken to the hospital with injuries that are not life threatening.
Police say the teenager is not cooperating with them, but they think the teen knew the people who shot him.
Witnesses in the area say they saw two other teenagers, about the same age as the victim, with a gun, get into a beige passenger car, around the time of the shooting.
